On a mission to discover through data, analytics, data science, machine learning and artificial intelligence

BIOGRAPHY
A lifeâ€™s work in statistics, analytics, research and data science, developing analytics solutions and delivering insight.

In a career spanning over 2 decades I have been fortunate to follow my passion for data and analytics, in both academia and industry. Applying statistical, computational and machine learning methods to a variety of data-driven problems in financial services, marketing, market research and medical statistics.

Throughout my career I have strived to seek insight from data, solve problems using analytics - no matter what the environment. Designing diagnostic methods, building data repositories, delivering analytics decision systems and developing many machine and statistical learning solutions, exploiting a variety of supervised and unsupervised techniques. Always with the objective of drawing insight from data.

A passionate analytics innovator, skilled at increasing individual and organisational analytics and data capabilities. Advancing and nurturing people through mentoring, coaching, collaboration and coffee. Always on the edge of the next innovation, I help advance organisation capability through next gen analytics architecture, innovative data solutions, building machine learning models and deploying decision systems.

I'm on a mission to discover through data and analytics.

_______

EXPERTISE
Over two decades experience leading analytics teams in delivery of predictive modelling solutions, analytics systems and data science.
  • Behavioural predictive modelling methods
  • Credit application scoring modelling
  • Propensity and attrition modelling
  • Customer segmentation and retention modelling
  • Development of commercial geodemographic clustering and segmentation models
  • Risk capital modelling of probability of default, exposure of default and loss given default
  • Loss forecasting and credit provisioning modelling
  • Implementing predictive model systems and models
  • Maintaining and monitoring models
  • Multivariate analysis techniques
  • Neural networks with multi-layered perceptron
  • Bootstrap and Jackknife simulation for resampling distributions
  • Reject inference methods
  • Sampling methods and stratified random sampling
  • Analytics and data science people leader
  • Leadership and management of small and large analytics teams
  • Variable transformation and feature derivation
  • Data commercialisation
  • Analytics frameworks and architecture
  • Adaptive analytics system deployment
  • Programming in R, Python, SAS, SQL, Fortran, VBA, Visual Basic, HTML, CSS, JavaScript

Companies and organisations worked with, collaborated with and worked for.

PUBLICATIONS
Articles, letters, posters and papers published in refereed research journals.
  • Poller L, Van Den Besselaar AMHP, Jespersen J, Tripodi A, Houghton D. Correction for lack of coincidence of normal and abnormal calibration slopes in ISI determination. Thrombosis and Haemostasis
  • Poller L, Van Den Besselaar AMHP, Jespersen J, Tripodi A, Houghton D. The effect of sample size on fresh plasma thromboplastin ISI determination. British Journal of Haematology.
  • Poller L, Van Den Besselaar AMHP, Jespersen, J, Tripodi, A, Houghton D. A comparison of linear and orthogonal regression analysis for local INR determination in ECAA coagulometer studies. European Concerted Action on Anticoagulation. British Journal of Haematology.
  • Poller L, Barrowcliffe TW, Van Den Besselaar AMHP, Jespersen J, Tripodi A, Houghton D. Minimum lyophilized plasma requirement for ISI calibration. European Concerted Action on Anticoagulation. American Journal of Clinical Pathology.
  • Poller L, Barrowcliffe TW, Van Den Besselaar AMHP, Jespersen J, Tripodi A, Houghton D. The European Concerted Action on Anticoagulation (ECAA) evaluation of a set of lyophilized normal plasmas to establish the normal prothrombin time for coagulometer systems. Thrombosis and Haemostasis.
  • Poller L, Van Den Besselaar AMHP, Jespersen J, Tripodi A, Houghton D. The European Concerted Action on Anticoagulation (ECAA): Field studies of coagulometer effects on the ISI of ECAA thromboplastins. Thrombosis and Haemostasis.
  • Poller L, Van Den Besselaar AMHP, Jespersen J, Tripodi A, Houghton D. The importance of "like to like" ISI calibrations with freeze dried plasmas. European Concerted Action on Anticoagulation. Journal of Clinical Pathology.
  • Poller L, Van Den Besselaar AMHP, Jespersen J, Tripodi A, Houghton D. A comparison of artificially-depleted, lyophilized coumarin and fresh coumarin plasmas in thromboplastin calibration. European Concerted Action on Anticoagulation. British Journal of Haematology.
  • Poller L, Barrowcliffe TW, Van Den Besselaar AMHP, Jespersen J, Tripodi A, Houghton D. A simplified statistical method for local INR using linear regression. European Concerted Action on Anticoagulation. British Journal of Haematology.
  • Pollar L, Barrowcliffe TW, van den Basselaar AMHP, Jespersen J, Tripodi A, Houghton D. The European Concerted Action on Anticoagulation (ECAA). A simplified statistical method for local INR using linear regression. British Journal Haematology.
  • Houghton D, Barrowcliffe TW, van den Basselaar AMHP, Jespersen J, Tripodi A, Pollar L. The European Concerted Action on Anticoagulation (ECAA). ECAA field studies of lyophilized plasmas in local prothrombin time (PT) system ISI calibration. Abstract, XVIth Congress of International Society on Thrombosis and Haemostasis.
  • Houghton D, Barrowcliffe TW, van den Basselaar AMHP, Jespersen J, Tripodi A, Pollar L. The European Concerted Action on Anticoagulation (ECAA). An assessment of the reliability of a simplified method of statistical analysis for INR correction based on linear regression. Abstract, XVIth Congress of International Society on Thrombosis and Haemostasis.
  • Poller L, Barrowcliffe TW, Van Den Besselaar AMHP, Jespersen J, Tripodi A, Houghton D. European Concerted Action on Anticoagulation (ECAA)- The multicentre calibration of rabbit and human ECAA reference thromboplastins. Thrombosis and Haemostasis.
  • Pollar L, Barrowcliffe TW, van den Basselaar AMHP, Jespersen J, Tripodi A, Houghton D. The European Concerted Action on Anticoagulation (ECAA). Multicentre calibrations of human and rabbit reference thromboplastins. British Journal of Haematology.
  • Poller L, Houghton D, Carroll J. The reliability of the mean normal prothrombin time of fresh plasmas and of the normal value from a lyophilized 'normal' plasma in prothrombin ratio determination. British Journal of Haematology.
